ProjectTitle: Performing Conversion: Saintly Indigenous Witnesses and Global Identities in the Iberian Colonies
InitialFeedbackHistory:
11/10/2024
Data: Will you analyse texts, documents from archives, literature etc? If so please add these in the data table, this is considered existing data. 
Storage: Is there a specific reason not to use KU Leuven storage solutions? These are generally more secure with automated backup, please have a look at the storage for recommendations from ICTS:  guidehttps://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en
Preservation: Will you use RDR for all your data? For data that you don't share please have a look at the storage guide to find suitable long term storage solutions.
label: good with suggestions
